verses.verse: And it came to pass in the seventh <WH7637> year <WH8141>, in the fifth <WH2549> month <WH6218>, the tenth day of the month <WH2320>, that certain <WH582> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to inquire <WH1875> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and sat <WH3427> before me <WH6440>.
And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, speak <WH1696> unto the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: Is it to inquire <WH1875> of me that ye are come <WH935>? As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, I will not be inquired of by you <WH1875>.
Wilt thou judge <WH8199> them <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, wilt thou judge <WH8199> them <WH3045>? Cause them to know the abominations <WH8441> of their fathers <WH1>;

and say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: In the day <WH3117> when I chose <WH977> Israel <WH3478>, and sware <WH3027> unto <WH5375> the seed <WH2233> of the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and made myself known <WH3045> unto them in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, when I sware <WH3027> unto <WH5375> them <WH559>, saying, I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>;

in that day <WH3117> I sware <WH3027> unto <WH5375> them <WH3318>, to bring them forth out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> into a land <WH776> that I had searched <WH8446> out for them <WH2100>, flowing with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, which is the glory <WH6643> of all lands <WH776>.

And I said <WH559> unto them <WH7993>, Cast ye away every man <WH376> the abominations <WH8251> of his eyes <WH5869>, and defile <WH2930> not yourselves with the idols <WH1544> of Egypt <WH4714>; I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

But they rebelled <WH4784> against me <WH14>, and would not hearken <WH8085> unto me <WH376>; they did not every man cast away <WH7993> the abominations <WH8251> of their eyes <WH5869>, neither did they forsake <WH5800> the idols <WH1544> of Egypt <WH4714>. Then I said <WH559> I would pour out <WH8210> my wrath <WH2534> upon them <WH3615>, to accomplish my anger <WH639> against them in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

But I wrought <WH6213> for my name <WH8034>'s sake <WH2490>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <WH5869> of the nations <WH1471>, among <WH8432> which they were <WH5869>, in whose sight I made myself known <WH3045> unto them <WH3318>, in bringing them forth out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
So I caused them to go forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and brought <WH935> them into the wilderness <WH4057>.
And I gave <WH5414> them my statutes <WH2708>, and showed <WH3045> them mine ordinances <WH4941>, which if a man <WH120> do <WH6213>, he shall live in them <WH2425>.
Moreover also I gave <WH5414> them my sabbaths <WH7676>, to be a sign <WH226> between me and them <WH3045>, that they might know that I am Jehovah <WH3068> that sanctifieth them <WH6942>.

But the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> rebelled <WH4784> against me in the wilderness <WH4057>: they walked <WH1980> not in my statutes <WH2708>, and they rejected <WH3988> mine ordinances <WH4941>, which if a man <WH120> keep <WH6213>, he shall live <WH2425> in them <WH7676>; and my sabbaths they greatly <WH3966> profaned <WH2490>. Then I said <WH559> I would pour out <WH8210> my wrath <WH2534> upon them in the wilderness <WH4057>, to consume them <WH3615>.
But I wrought <WH6213> for my name <WH8034>'s sake <WH2490>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <WH5869> of the nations <WH1471>, in whose sight <WH5869> I brought them out <WH3318>.

Moreover also I sware <WH3027> unto <WH5375> them in the wilderness <WH4057>, that I would not bring <WH935> them into the land <WH776> which I had given <WH5414> them <WH2100>, flowing with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, which is the glory <WH6643> of all lands <WH776>;

because they rejected <WH3988> mine ordinances <WH4941>, and walked <WH1980> not in my statutes <WH2708>, and profaned <WH2490> my sabbaths <WH7676>: for their heart <WH3820> went <WH1980> after <WH310> their idols <WH1544>.
Nevertheless mine eye <WH5869> spared <WH2347> them <WH7843>, and I destroyed them not <WH6213>, neither did I make a full end <WH3617> of them in the wilderness <WH4057>.

And I said <WH559> unto their children <WH1121> in the wilderness <WH4057>, Walk <WH3212> ye not in the statutes <WH2706> of your fathers <WH1>, neither observe <WH8104> their ordinances <WH4941>, nor defile <WH2930> yourselves with their idols <WH1544>.
I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>: walk <WH3212> in my statutes <WH2708>, and keep <WH8104> mine ordinances <WH4941>, and do them <WH6213>;
and hallow <WH6942> my sabbaths <WH7676>; and they shall be a sign <WH226> between me and you <WH3045>, that ye may know that I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

But the children <WH1121> rebelled <WH4784> against me <WH1980>; they walked not in my statutes <WH2708>, neither kept <WH8104> mine ordinances <WH4941> to do <WH6213> them <WH120>, which if a man do <WH6213>, he shall live <WH2425> in them <WH2490>; they profaned my sabbaths <WH7676>. Then I said <WH559> I would pour out <WH8210> my wrath <WH2534> upon them <WH3615>, to accomplish my anger <WH639> against them in the wilderness <WH4057>.

Nevertheless I withdrew <WH7725> my hand <WH3027>, and wrought <WH6213> for my name <WH8034>'s sake <WH2490>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <WH5869> of the nations <WH1471>, in whose sight <WH5869> I brought them forth <WH3318>.
Moreover I sware <WH3027> unto <WH5375> them in the wilderness <WH4057>, that I would scatter <WH6327> them among the nations <WH1471>, and disperse <WH2219> them through the countries <WH776>;

because they had not executed <WH6213> mine ordinances <WH4941>, but had rejected <WH3988> my statutes <WH2708>, and had profaned <WH2490> my sabbaths <WH7676>, and their eyes <WH5869> were after <WH310> their fathers <WH1>' idols <WH1544>.
Moreover also I gave <WH5414> them statutes <WH2706> that were not good <WH2896>, and ordinances <WH4941> wherein they should not live <WH2421>;

and I polluted <WH2930> them in their own gifts <WH4979>, in that they caused to pass through <WH5674> the fire all that openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7356>, that I might make them desolate <WH8074>, to the end that they might know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

Therefore <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, speak <WH1696> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: In this moreover have your fathers <WH1> blasphemed <WH1442> me <WH4603>, in that they have committed a trespass against me <WH4604>.

For when I had brought <WH935> them into the land <WH776>, which I sware <WH3027> to <WH5375> give <WH5414> unto them <WH7200>, then they saw every high <WH7311> hill <WH1389>, and every thick <WH5687> tree <WH6086>, and they offered <WH2076> there their sacrifices <WH2077>, and there they presented <WH5414> the provocation <WH3708> of their offering <WH2076>; there also they made <WH7760> their sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381>, and they poured out <WH5258> there their drink-offerings <WH5262>.
Then I said <WH559> unto them <WH1116>, What meaneth the high place whereunto ye go <WH935>? So the name <WH8034> thereof is called <WH7121> Bamah <WH1117> unto this day <WH3117>.

Wherefore say <WH559> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: Do ye pollute <WH2930> yourselves after the manner <WH1870> of your fathers <WH1>? and play ye the harlot <WH2181> after <WH310> their abominations <WH8251>?

and when ye offer <WH5375> your gifts <WH4979>, when ye make your sons <WH1121> to pass through <WH5674> the fire <WH784>, do ye pollute <WH2930> yourselves with all your idols <WH1544> unto this day <WH3117>? and shall I be inquired <WH1875> of by you <WH1004>, O house of Israel <WH3478>? As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, I will not be inquired of by you <WH1875>;

and that which cometh <WH5927> into your mind <WH7307> shall not be at all <WH559>, in that ye say, We will be <WH1961> as the nations <WH1471>, as the families <WH4940> of the countries <WH776>, to serve <WH8334> wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.

As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, surely with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>, and with wrath <WH2534> poured out <WH5186>, will I be king over you <WH4427>:

and I will bring you out <WH3318> from the peoples <WH5971>, and will gather <WH6908> you out of the countries <WH776> wherein ye are scattered <WH6327>, with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>, and with wrath <WH2534> poured out <WH5186>;
and I will bring <WH935> you into the wilderness <WH4057> of the peoples <WH5971>, and there will I enter into judgment <WH8199> with you face <WH6440> to face <WH6440>.

Like as I entered into judgment <WH8199> with your fathers <WH1> in the wilderness <WH4057> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, so will I enter into judgment <WH8199> with you <WH5002>, saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
And I will cause you to pass <WH5674> under the rod <WH7626>, and I will bring <WH935> you into the bond <WH4562> of the covenant <WH1285>;

and I will purge out <WH1305> from among you the rebels <WH4775>, and them that transgress <WH6586> against me <WH3318>; I will bring them forth out of the land <WH776> where they sojourn <WH4033>, but they shall not enter <WH935> into the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>: and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

As for you <WH1004>, O house of Israel <WH3478>, thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Go <WH3212> ye <WH5647>, serve every one <WH376> his idols <WH1544>, and hereafter <WH310> also <WH8085>, if ye will not hearken unto me <WH6944>; but my holy name <WH8034> shall ye no more profane <WH2490> with your gifts <WH4979>, and with your idols <WH1544>.

For in my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, in the mountain <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Israel <WH3478>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, there shall all the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, all of them <WH5647>, serve me in the land <WH776>: there will I accept <WH7521> them <WH1875>, and there will I require your offerings <WH8641>, and the first-fruits <WH7225> of your oblations <WH4864>, with all your holy things <WH6944>.

As a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> will I accept <WH7521> you <WH3318>, when I bring you out from the peoples <WH5971>, and gather <WH6908> you out <WH3318> of the countries <WH776> wherein ye have been scattered <WH6327>; and I will be sanctified <WH6942> in you in the sight of the nations <WH1471>.

And ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I shall bring <WH935> you into the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, into the country <WH776> which I sware <WH3027> to <WH5375> give <WH5414> unto your fathers <WH1>.

And there shall ye remember <WH2142> your ways <WH1870>, and all your doings <WH5949>, wherein ye have polluted <WH2930> yourselves <WH6962>; and ye shall loathe yourselves in your own sight <WH6440> for all your evils <WH7451> that ye have committed <WH6213>.

And ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I have dealt <WH6213> with you for my name <WH8034>'s sake <WH7451>, not according to your evil ways <WH1870>, nor according to your corrupt <WH7843> doings <WH5949>, O ye house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the south <WH8486>, and drop <WH5197> thy word toward the south <WH1864>, and prophesy <WH5012> against the forest <WH3293> of the field <WH7704> in the South <WH5045>;

and say <WH559> to the forest <WH3293> of the South <WH5045>, Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>: Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3068>, Behold <WH3341>, I will kindle a fire <WH784> in thee <WH398>, and it shall devour every green <WH3892> tree <WH6086> in thee <WH3002>, and every dry tree <WH6086>: the flaming <WH3852> flame <WH7957> shall not be quenched <WH3518>, and all faces <WH6440> from the south <WH5045> to the north <WH6828> shall be burnt thereby <WH6866>.
And all flesh <WH1320> shall see <WH7200> that I <WH3068>, Jehovah, have kindled <WH1197> it <WH3518>; it shall not be quenched.
Then said <WH559> I <WH162>, Ah Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>! they say <WH559> of me <WH4911>, Is he not a speaker of parables <WH4912>?
